commands: ps aux | grep 'Milo.API.dll' | grep -v grep | awk '{print "Process ID:", $2, "Running since:", $9}'
echo '=== Watching for EMAIL logs (last 10 minutes) ==='
sudo journalctl -u milo-api --since '10 minutes ago' | grep -i EMAIL || echo 'No EMAIL logs yet - ready to receive task assignment notifications'
